attributes.action: create a new law whereby if someone in work pisses you off, you are allowed to slap them with a fish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On more than one occasion someone in work will piss you off. I feel that if you were allowed to slap that person with a fish it would relieve any anger you may have towards that person and brighten up what once was a bad day.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
